ygData.subject: Re: lvl 49 hybrid-only spells.. interesting
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have seen the spell in there, but I thought it might be the weapon proc for vampiric curse on the Pestilence Scythe (other proc ing effects are in there,
ygData.messageBody:
Grant Vanderhule wrote:
>
> From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
>
> somebody has been peeking thru the spell data file in the everquest
> directory.. and they discovered that each of the hybrid classes has a unique
> spell. the sk version is called, "life leech". yes, life leech. and the
> listed damage is 280.. but with a 2 minute delay between casts. i'm about to
> try to get into that data file myself to see if i can confirm or deny this..
> i'll let you folks know.
>
> Beld Demonblade
> Fennin Ro
>

I have seen the spell in there, but I thought it might be the weapon
proc for vampiric curse on the Pestilence Scythe (other proc'ing
effects are in there, too).


Chip
